solution.text:
Total cost of ticket = No of kilometres travelled \(\times\) price per km
Price per km = Rs. \(\frac{_{{100*j}}_}{3} \)
Therefore total cost of ticket = \( 1533 \times \frac{_{{100*j}}_}{3} \)
\(\Rightarrow\)Total cost of ticket= Rs. _{{51100*j}}_

content.text: A plane ticket costs Rs. _{{100*j}}_  per every 3 Km travelled. Aman goes from Pune to Delhi which is at a distance of 1533 Km. how much does his plane ticket cost Aman?
